Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Transport_Proto.name: initiator
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Transport_Proto.abstract: REQUIRED - The initiator, for creating search commands.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Transport_Proto.name: organization
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Transport_Proto.abstract: REQUIRED - The transport organization to which this instance is assigned. It should generally be declared weak.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Transport_Proto.name: sdkInstance
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Transport_Proto.abstract: OPTIONAL, AND SHOULD GENERALLY NOT BE IMPLEMENTED - The SDK instance to which this transport’s organization is assigned.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Transport_Proto.name: baseURL
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Transport_Proto.abstract: OPTIONAL - The “base” URL for the transport target.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_SearchInitiator.name: MeetingSearchCallbackClosure
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_SearchInitiator.abstract: This is the callback made, when the search is complete.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_SearchInitiator.name: transport
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_SearchInitiator.abstract: OPTIONAL (BUT ACTUALLY REQUIRED) - The transport to be used for this initiator.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Parser_Protocol.name: parseThis(searchType:searchRefinements:data:completion:)
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Parser_Protocol.abstract: REQUIRED - This parses data, and returns meetings.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Protocol.html#/.name: organization
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Protocol.html#/.abstract: REQUIRED - The search organization. This needs to be the “transport” version of the organization.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Protocol.html#/.name: lastSearch
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Protocol.html#/.abstract: REQUIRED - The “cached” last search. It may be nil (no last search cached).

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Protocol.html#/.name: meetingSearch(type:refinements:completion:)
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Protocol.html#/.abstract: OPTIONAL, AND SHOULD GENERALLY NOT BE IMPLEMENTED - This executes a meeting search.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Se.name: searchType
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Se.abstract: REQUIRED - This is the search specification main search type.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Se.name: searchRefinements
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Se.abstract: REQUIRED - This is the search specification additional filters.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Se.name: meetings
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Se.abstract: REQUIRED - This contains any found meetings. It may be empty (no meetings found).

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Additional_Info.name: extraInfo
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Additional_Info.abstract: OPTIONAL - This will return any “extra info,” applied to the conformant instance.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_RefCon_Protocol.name: refCon
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_RefCon_Protocol.abstract: OPTIONAL - This allows the SDK to declare a “refcon” (reference context), attaching any data to the object.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Organization_Tr.name: transport
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Organization_Tr.abstract: REQUIRED - This allows us to have an organization-specific transport. This should be a strong reference (if the transport is a class).

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Organization_Pr.name: sdkInstance
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Organization_Pr.abstract: REQUIRED - The SDK instance to which this organization is assigned. This should generally be declared weak.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Organization_Pr.name: organizationName
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Organization_Pr.abstract: REQUIRED - The name for this organization (a short descriptive string).

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Organization_Pr.name: organizationDescription
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Organization_Pr.abstract: REQUIRED - The longer description for this organization. May be nil.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Organization_Pr.name: organizationURL
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Organization_Pr.abstract: OPTIONAL - The URL for this organization. May be nil.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: organization
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: REQUIRED - The meeting organization.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: id
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: REQUIRED - Each meeting should have a unique (in the search domain) integer ID.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: weekdayIndex
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: REQUIRED - The repeating weekday for the meeting (1-based, with 1 being Sunday, and 7 being Saturday).

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: meetingStartTime
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: REQUIRED - The start time of the meeting, as military time (HHMM). This only applies, if (1...7).contains(weekday).

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: physicalLocation
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: REQUIRED - If the meeting has a physical presence, this will have the location. Nil, if no physical location.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: virtualMeetingInfo
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: REQUIRED - If the meeting has a virtual presence, this will have that information. Nil, if no virtual meeting.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: formats
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: REQUIRED - If the meeting has formats, then this contains a list of them. Empty, if no formats.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: meetingType
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL, AND SHOULD GENERALLY NOT BE IMPLEMENTED - The meeting venue type.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: startTime
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL, AND SHOULD GENERALLY NOT BE IMPLEMENTED - Returns an optional DateComponents object, with the time of the meeting. Nil, if one-time event.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: startTimeAndDay
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL, AND SHOULD GENERALLY NOT BE IMPLEMENTED - Returns an optional DateComponents object, with the weekday and time of the meeting. Nil, if one-time event.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: startTimeInSeconds
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL, AND SHOULD GENERALLY NOT BE IMPLEMENTED - The start time, in seconds.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: durationInMinutes
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL, AND SHOULD GENERALLY NOT BE IMPLEMENTED - The duration in minutes.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: adjustedWeekdayIndex
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL, AND SHOULD GENERALLY NOT BE IMPLEMENTED - The weekday, adjusted for the start of week.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: locationCoords
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL, AND SHOULD GENERALLY NOT BE IMPLEMENTED - A direct accessor for the physical location coordinates.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: meetingLocalTimezone
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL, AND SHOULD GENERALLY NOT BE IMPLEMENTED - The local timezone of the meeting.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: simpleLocationText
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL, AND SHOULD GENERALLY NOT BE IMPLEMENTED - This gives a “summarized” location. If the meeting is virtual-only, this will be nil.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: nextStartDate
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL - The next meeting (from now) will start on this date (time).

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: name
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL - The name for this meeting.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: distanceInMeters
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL - The distance of this meetings from the search.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: meetingDuration
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL - The duration of the meeting, in seconds.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: comments
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL - If the meeting has comments associated, they will be here, as a String. Empty, if no comments.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: meetingURI
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL - If the meeting has a URI (not a virtual meeting URI -for example, a Group Web site), that is available here.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.name: videoMeeting
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.abstract: OPTIONAL - If there is a video meeting associated, it is defined here. May be nil. This also applies to audio-only (not phone) meetings.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.name: phoneMeeting
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.abstract: OPTIONAL - If there is a phone meeting associated, it is defined here. May be nil.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.name: description
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.abstract: REQUIRED - This describes the meeting venue (i.e. “Video,” “Zoom,” “Audio-Only,” “Phone,” etc.).

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.name: timeZone
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.abstract: REQUIRED - The local timezone for the meeting.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.name: url
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.abstract: OPTIONAL - If the meeting has a URI, that is available here.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.name: meetingID
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.abstract: OPTIONAL - If the meeting has a separate meeting ID, that is available here, as a String.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.name: password
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.abstract: OPTIONAL - If the meeting has a separate meeting password, that is available here, as a String.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Physica.name: postalAddress
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Physica.abstract: REQUIRED - The location is stored as a standard postal address.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Format_Protocol.name: id
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Format_Protocol.abstract: REQUIRED - The Integer ID for this format.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Format_Protocol.name: name
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Format_Protocol.abstract: REQUIRED - The name for this format (a short descriptive string).

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Format_Protocol.name: description
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Format_Protocol.abstract: REQUIRED - The longer description for this format.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Format_Protocol.name: LGV_MeetingSDK_Format_Protocol
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Format_Protocol.abstract: Each meeting may have a list of associated formats, describing details about the meeting.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Physica.name: LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Physical_Protocol
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Physica.abstract: This defines the meeting’s physical location component.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.name: LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual_Venue_Protocol
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.abstract: This is one of the venues in a virtual meeting specifier.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.name: LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual_Protocol
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.abstract: This defines the meeting’s virtual component (if any).

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protocol
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: Each meeting instance will present itself as conforming to this protocol.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Organization_Pr.name: LGV_MeetingSDK_Organization_Protocol
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Organization_Pr.abstract: Each meeting is given/managed by an organization (AA, NA, etc.). This defines the associated organization.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Organization_Tr.name: LGV_MeetingSDK_Organization_Transport_Protocol
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Organization_Tr.abstract: We define this as applied to classes, so it can be overloaded/ridden. The idea is to define a specific organization, with a custom transport, for each server.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_RefCon_Protocol.name: LGV_MeetingSDK_RefCon_Protocol
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_RefCon_Protocol.abstract: This defines a protocol, that defines a simple extraInfo String, allowing conformant types to store string information.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Additional_Info.name: LGV_MeetingSDK_Additional_Info_Protocol
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Additional_Info.abstract: This defines a protocol, that declares a simple extraInfo String, allowing conformant types to store string information.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Se.name: LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set_Protocol
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Se.abstract: This defines a protocol, containing a “found set” of meeting data.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Protocol.html.name: LGV_MeetingSDK_Protocol
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Protocol.html.abstract: This defines the requirements for the main SDK instance.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Parser_Protocol.name: LGV_MeetingSDK_Parser_Protocol
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Parser_Protocol.abstract: This defines the requirements for an instance of a data parser for the transport.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_SearchInitiator.name: LGV_MeetingSDK_SearchInitiator_Protocol
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_SearchInitiator.abstract: This is supplied to a transport instance, and is used to form the searh “stimulus” commands, to be sent to the server.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Transport_Proto.name: LGV_MeetingSDK_Transport_Protocol
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Transport_Proto.abstract: This defines requirements for a loosely-coupled transport layer.

Enums/LGV_MeetingSDK_VenueType_Enum.html.name: invalid
Enums/LGV_MeetingSDK_VenueType_Enum.html.abstract: There is no valid venue (the meeting is not valid).

Enums/LGV_MeetingSDK_VenueType_Enum.html.name: virtualOnly
Enums/LGV_MeetingSDK_VenueType_Enum.html.abstract: There is no physical location associated with this meeting.

Enums/LGV_MeetingSDK_VenueType_Enum.html.name: inPersonOnly
Enums/LGV_MeetingSDK_VenueType_Enum.html.abstract: There is only a physical location associated with this meeting.

Enums/LGV_MeetingSDK_VenueType_Enum.html.name: hybrid
Enums/LGV_MeetingSDK_VenueType_Enum.html.abstract: There are both a physical location, and a virtual venue, associated with this meeting.

Enums/LGV_MeetingSDK_VenueType_Enum.html.name: LGV_MeetingSDK_VenueType_Enum
Enums/LGV_MeetingSDK_VenueType_Enum.html.abstract: Each meeting is either in-person (has a physical location), virtual-only (no physical location), or hybrid (both).

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Generic_Organizat.name: _transport
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Generic_Organizat.abstract: We store the transport in a private property, and access it, via a computed one. This is a strong reference.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Generic_Organizat.name: _organizationDescription
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Generic_Organizat.abstract: We store the description in a private property, and access it, via a computed one.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Generic_Organizat.name: _organizationURL
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Generic_Organizat.abstract: We store the URL in a private property, and access it, via a computed one.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Generic_Organizat.name: sdkInstance
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Generic_Organizat.abstract: The SDK instance to which this organization is assigned. This is a weak reference.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Generic_Organizat.name: organizationKey
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Generic_Organizat.abstract: This is the unique key for the organization. This should be unique in the SDK execution environment.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Generic_Organizat.name: organizationName
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Generic_Organizat.abstract: This is a short name for the organization.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Generic_Organizat.name: transport
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Generic_Organizat.abstract: This is the accessor for the transport private property.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Generic_Organizat.name: organizationDescription
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Generic_Organizat.abstract: This is the accessor for the description private property.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Generic_Organizat.name: organizationURL
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Generic_Organizat.abstract: This is the accessor for the URL private property.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK.html#/s:14LGV_Mee.name: _organization
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK.html#/s:14LGV_Mee.abstract: This is the organization that applies to this search instance. This is a strong reference.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK.html#/s:14LGV_Mee.name: _lastSearch
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK.html#/s:14LGV_Mee.abstract: The “cached” last search. It may be nil (no last search cached).

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK.html#/s:14LGV_Mee.name: init(organization:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK.html#/s:14LGV_Mee.abstract: This is the default initializer for the search SDK.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK.html#/s:14LGV_Mee.name: organization
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK.html#/s:14LGV_Mee.abstract: This is the organization that applies to this search instance.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK.html#/s:14LGV_Mee.name: lastSearch
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK.html#/s:14LGV_Mee.abstract: The “cached” last search. It may be nil (no last search cached).

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: type
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: The type of enum

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: venueTypes
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: A list of venue types.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: weekdays
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: A list of weekdays

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: startTimeRange_LowerBound
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: The lower bound of the start time range.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: startTimeRange_UpperBound
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: The upper bound of the start time range.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: string
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: The search string.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: distanceFrom_Lat
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: The latitude of the coordinate we want to find the distance from

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: distanceFrom_Lng
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: The longitude of the coordinate we want to find the distance from

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: none
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: This means don’t apply any refinements to the main search.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: venueTypes(_:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: This allows us to provide a filter for the venue type, in our search.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: weekdays(_:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: This allows us to specify certain weekdays to be returned.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: startTimeRange(_:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: This allows us to specify a range of times, from 0000 (midnight this morning), to 2400 (midnight tonight), inclusive.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: string(searchString:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: This allows a string to be submitted for a search.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: distanceFrom(thisLocation:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: We can specify a location that can be used as a “fulcrum,” from which to measure distance to the results.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: debugDescription
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: CustomDebugStringConvertible Conformance

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: hashKey
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: Used to make sure that we can only have one of each, regardless of associated values.
Equatable Conformance

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: hash(into:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: Hashable Conformance

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: _typeIndex(for:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: Returns the parameter storage index for the type.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: CodingKeys
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: This enum defines the keys for the Codable protocol

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: encode(to:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: Stores the state into an Encoder.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: init(from:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: Initializes from a decoder.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: type
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: The type of search

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: centerLongLat_Lat
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: The latitude of the center of a radius search.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: centerLongLat_Lng
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: The longitude of the center of a radius search.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: radiusInMeters
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: The radius, in meters, of a constrained radius search.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: minimumNumberOfResults
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: The minimum number of results, for an auto-radius search.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: ids
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: The ids, for an ID search.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: none
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: No search constraints.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: fixedRadius(centerLongLat:radiusInMeters:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: This means that the search will sweep up every meeting within radiusInMeters meters of centerLongLat.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: autoRadius(centerLongLat:minimumNumberOfResults:maxRadiusInMeters:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: This means that the search will start at centerLongLat, and move outward, in “rings,” until it gets at least the minimumNumberOfResults number of meetings, and will stop there.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: meetingID(ids:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: This is a very basic Array of individual meeting IDs.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: debugDescription
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: CustomDebugStringConvertible Conformance

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: _typeIndex(for:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: Returns the parameter storage index for the type.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: CodingKeys
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: This enum defines the keys for the Codable protocol

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: encode(to:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: Stores the state into an Encoder.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: init(from:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: Initializes from a decoder.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: sunday
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: Sunday is always 1. The start of week is not taken into account, and should be handled at a level above this connector.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: monday
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: Monday

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: tuesday
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: Tuesday

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: wednesday
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: Wednesday

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: thursday
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: Thursday

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: friday
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: Friday

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: saturday
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: Saturday (Maximum value of 7).

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: debugDescription
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: CustomDebugStringConvertible Conformance

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: jsonParseFailure(error:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: The JSON parser threw an error.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: allCases
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: CaseIterable Conformance

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: debugDescription
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: CustomDebugStringConvertible Conformance

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: redirectionError(error:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: The server successfully completed, but there was a redirection (which we consider a failure).

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: clientError(error:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: There was a problem with what we sent to the server.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: serverError(error:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: The server had a cow.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: missingResponseError(error:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: Thisis called in case no HTTP response came in. It will likely never happen.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: generalError(error:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: None of the above.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: allCases
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: CaseIterable Conformance

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: debugDescription
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: CustomDebugStringConvertible Conformance

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: CommunicationError
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: This enum is based on the Swift Error protocol. It provides errors specific to communication with the source server.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: ParserError
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: This enum is based on the Swift Error protocol. It provides errors specific to parsing the returned data.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: communicationError(error:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: Error in communicating with the source server.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: parsingError(error:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: Error parsing the returned meeting data.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: generalError(error:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: All other errors.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: allCases
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: CaseIterable Conformance

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: debugDescription
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: CustomDebugStringConvertible Conformance

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: Error
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: This enum is based on the Swift Error protocol, and “wraps” more specific errors. It provides the general error categories.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: Weekdays
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: This integer-based enum is a 1-based weekday specifier for the LGV_MeetingSDK_SearchInitiator_Search_Refinements.weekdays specialization.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: SearchConstraints
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: These are enums that describe the “main” search parameters.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.name: Search_Refinements
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set/.abstract: The main search can have “refinements” applied, that filter the response further.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set..name: extraInfo
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set..abstract: This allows us to have extra information attached to the found set.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set..name: refCon
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set..abstract: This allows us to have a reference context attached to the found set.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set..name: searchType
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set..abstract: This is the search specification main search type.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set..name: searchRefinements
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set..abstract: This is the search specification additional filters.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set..name: meetings
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set..abstract: This contains any found meetings. It may be empty (no meetings found).

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/In.name: _transport
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/In.abstract: The transport to be used for this initiator.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/In.name: transport
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/In.abstract: The transport to be used for this initiator.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/In.name: init()
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/In.abstract: Default init. we simply create a parser, and let it know about us.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/Pa.name: _isStringInHere(meeting:string:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/Pa.abstract: Checks a meeting, to see if a given string is present.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/Pa.name: string(_:beginsWith:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/Pa.abstract: This tests a string to see if a given substring is present at the start.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/Pa.name: _isThisString(_:withinThisString:options:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/Pa.abstract: This allows us to find if a string contains another string.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/Pa.name: _decimalOnly(_:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/Pa.abstract: This simply strips out all non-decimal characters in the string, leaving only valid decimal digits.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/Pa.name: _convert(thisDataToAVirtualLocation:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/Pa.abstract: Creates (or not) a virtual location, based on the provided meeting details.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/Pa.name: _convert(thisDataToAPhysicalLocation:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/Pa.abstract: This converts “raw” (String Dictionary) meeting objects, into actual Swift structs.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/Pa.name: _convert(theseFormats:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/Pa.abstract: This converts “raw” (String Dictionary) meeting objects, into actual Swift structs.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/Pa.name: _refineMeetings(_:searchType:searchRefinements:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/Pa.abstract: Yeah, this is a big, ugly function, with lots of cyclomatic complexity.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/Pa.name: _convert(theseMeetings:andTheseFormats:searchCenter:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/Pa.abstract: This converts “raw” (String Dictionary) meeting objects, into actual Swift structs.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/Pa.name: parseThis(searchType:searchRefinements:data:completion:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/Pa.abstract: REQUIRED - This parses data, and returns meetings.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/Pa.name: Parser
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/Pa.abstract: This is the parser. Most functionality will be in the extension.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/In.name: Initiator
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport/In.abstract: This is an initiator. It forms queries to the BMLT Root Server. Most functionality will be in the extension.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport.ht.name: baseURL
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport.ht.abstract: This will contain the URL to the Root Server that is being accessed by this transport instance.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport.ht.name: organization
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport.ht.abstract: The transport organization to which this instance is assigned.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport.ht.name: lastSearch
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport.ht.abstract: This contains the last search result set.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport.ht.name: testingRootServerURL
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport.ht.abstract: This is a special dummy URL that we use to allow mocking.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport.ht.name: debugMockDataResponse
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport.ht.abstract: This is used to “short-circuit” the actual network call.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport.ht.name: _dataFields
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport.ht.abstract: These are the specific fields that we request. It shortens the response.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport.ht.name: preparedURLString
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport.ht.abstract: This prepares the “baseline” URL string for the request.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport.ht.name: ceateURLRequest(type:refinements:)
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport.ht.abstract: Creates a URL Request, for the given search parameters.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting/Virt.name: url
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting/Virt.abstract: If the meeting has a URI, that is available here.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting/Virt.name: meetingID
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting/Virt.abstract: If the meeting has a separate meeting ID, that is available here, as a String.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting/Virt.name: password
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting/Virt.abstract: If the meeting has a separate meeting password, that is available here, as a String.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting/Virt.name: VirtualVenue
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting/Virt.abstract: This is a concrete implementation of the venue struct.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting/Virt.name: videoMeeting
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting/Virt.abstract: If there is a video meeting associated, it is defined here. May be nil. This also applies to audio-only (not phone) meetings.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting/Virt.name: phoneMeeting
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting/Virt.abstract: If there is a phone meeting associated, it is defined here. May be nil.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting/Phys.name: timeZone
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting/Phys.abstract: The local time zone of the meeting.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting/Phys.name: PhysicalLocation
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting/Phys.abstract: This describes a physical location for the meeting.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting/Virt.name: VirtualLocation
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting/Virt.abstract: This defines a set of virtual access points for the meeting (there may be multiple ones).

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting.html.name: organization
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting.html.abstract: The organization to which this meeting belongs.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting.html.name: id
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting.html.abstract: A unique ID for this meeting (within the organization).

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting.html.name: meetingDuration
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting.html.abstract: The duration of the meeting, in seconds.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting.html.name: distanceInMeters
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting.html.abstract: The distance of this meeting, from the search center, or a specified “distance from” refinement.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting.html.name: meetingStartTime
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting.html.abstract: The start time of the meeting, in miltary time (HHMM).

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting.html.name: formats
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Meeting.html.abstract: Any formats that apply to this meeting.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Format.html#.name: id
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Format.html#.abstract: This is a a unique ID (in the organization/server), for the format.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Format.html#.name: key
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Format.html#.abstract: This is a simple text “key” for the format. It should be unique in the found set.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Format.html#.name: name
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Format.html#.abstract: This is a short name for the format.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Format.html#.name: description
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Format.html#.abstract: This is a longer description for the format.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Data_Set.htm.name: extraInfo
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Data_Set.htm.abstract: This allows us to have extra information attached to the found set.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Data_Set.htm.name: refCon
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Data_Set.htm.abstract: This allows us to have a reference context attached to the found set.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Data_Set.htm.name: searchType
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Data_Set.htm.abstract: This is the search specification main search type.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Data_Set.htm.name: searchRefinements
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Data_Set.htm.abstract: This is the search specification additional filters.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Data_Set.htm.name: _meetings
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Data_Set.htm.abstract: This contains any found meetings. It may be empty (no meetings found).

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Data_Set.htm.name: meetings
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Data_Set.htm.abstract: This contains any found meetings. It may be empty (no meetings found).

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Data_Set.htm.name: Data_Set
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Data_Set.htm.abstract: This defines a class, containing a “found set” of meeting data.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Format.html.name: Format
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Format.html.abstract: This describes one “meeting format,” which is some extra information attached to a meeting, describing attributes.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport.ht.name: Transport
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT/Transport.ht.abstract: This transport is dedicated to the BMLT.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT.html#/s:14LG.name: organizationKey
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT.html#/s:14LG.abstract: The organization key to use for the test organization.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT.html#/s:14LG.name: organizationName
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT.html#/s:14LG.abstract: The name to use for the test organization.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT.html#/s:14LG.name: organizationDescription
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT.html#/s:14LG.abstract: The description to use for the test organization.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT.html#/s:14LG.name: organizationURL
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT.html#/s:14LG.abstract: The URL to use for the test organization.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT.html#/s:14LG.name: rootServerURLString
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT.html#/s:14LG.abstract: Simple accessor to the Root Server URL String.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT.html.name: LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_BMLT.html.abstract: This is a subclass of the main SDK class, that is “tuned” for the BMLT

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set..name: LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Data_Set..abstract: This defines a class, containing a “found set” of meeting data.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK.html.name: LGV_MeetingSDK
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK.html.abstract: This is instantiated, in order to provide meeting search capabilities for one organization.

Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Generic_Organizat.name: LGV_MeetingSDK_Generic_Organization
Classes/LGV_MeetingSDK_Generic_Organizat.abstract: This is a “general-purpose” organization class that should work for most requirements.
